publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5098# Aileen Campbell: Save Lesmahagow’s Jubilee Hall—That the Parliament notes with concern plans by South Lanarkshire Council to close and sell the Jubilee Hall in Lesmahagow; notes that this concern is shared by many members of the local community, the Community Council and various groups and users of the hall; believes that the Support the Jubilee Hall fun day, held by hall users on 31 October 2009, will further demonstrate the concern and opposition to the decision that exists locally, and considers that the hall continues to play an important function in Lesmahagow and is an important part of the town’s heritage that should be preserved. Supported by: Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*, Gil Paterson*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*
S3M-5098# Save Lesmahagow’s Jubilee Hall (lodged on 30 October 2009) Ian McKee*
